short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will help you to highlight the current focused element in a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your frontend development experience with the Focus Highlighter Chrome Extension. This indispensable tool empowers frontend developers by providing a swift and efficient way to highlight the active element or focused element on any web page. With just a click on the extension icon or the Ctrl+Shift+E shortcut, streamline your workflow and gain instant clarity in your accessibility compliance frontend project.
